title: Episode 91 - Prelude To Civil Rights 1930 - 50
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we examine how the New Deal and the Second World II shaped the early Civil Rights Movement. We examine the decline of scientific racism and how World War II restructured  American Society and the international order.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
